## loadFromSpec() function

Load a new theme directly from a ThemeSpec object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function loadFromSpec(spec: ThemeSpec, config?: ThemeConfig): Theme;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  spec | [ThemeSpec](./core.themespec.md) | the theme specificationw |
|  config | [ThemeConfig](./core.themeconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> the theme configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Theme](./core.theme.md)
